claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

combined_evidence.quote: For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains: A/West Virginia 30 2022 (A/Wisconsin/67/2022 pdm 09 like virus) (H1 N1), A/Massachusetts/18/ 2022 (H3 N2) and B/Austria/1359417/2021.
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly states that Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of hemagglutinin (HA) per strain for each of the three influenza virus strains, directly supporting the claim about Flublok's HA content.

combined_evidence.quote: Across three clinical trials (Studies 2 - 4, Tables 2 and 3) a total of 2050 adults age 50 years and older received Flublok and 2048 received a U.S.-licensed trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3) comparator.
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote establishes that the comparator for Flublok in the clinical trials was a standard-dose trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (IIV3), which is known to contain 15 mcg of HA per strain, thus providing context for the comparison in the claim.

combined_evidence.quote: Flublok is standardized according to United States Public Health Service (USPHS) requirements. For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains: A/West Virginia 30 2022 (A/Wisconsin/67/2022 pdm 09 like virus) (H1 N1), A/Massachusetts/18/2022 (H3 N2) and B/Austria/1359417/2021.
combined_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly states that Flublok contains 45 mcg of HA per strain, directly supporting the claim about its HA content per strain.
